channel.title: Nice going
channel.description:
who the hell gave sinisoul his cup back, and why?
Edit: If the logic is that he knows java then well yeah, anyone can learn a language (syntax and such) and create compilable, working code. My main complaint is that his designs are flawed and he has a knack for over complicating some procedures just for the hell of it - see: linked list impl that shows up in every damn release he makes. Not to mention in a conversation with him he didn't know what the time complexity of a linked lost was :/...
So, yeah... This thread is more about a frustration with standards and what makes a personal qualified than a flat out rant against the guy. But, uh if the standards are just knowing the language enough to make a working application then I feel that a lot of people qualify... Which sort of defeats the entire purpose of the award. Hell, by those standards I should have a mew - and I'm sure there'd be some speculation and concern from the old guard over that...

item.title: Nice going
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
